answerText: Zorba the Greek [or Life and Adventures of Alexis Zorbas][10] This Greek novelist of Zorba the Greek also wrote The Last Tempation of Christ.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 6 | 9 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel opens with a man reading The Divine Comedy while sitting in a cafe in Piraeus. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose title character calls Madame Hortense "Bouboulina" and wishes to open a mine in Crete.
